document_data.name: Bright Blade Brandished
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Bright Blade Brandished
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bright Blade Brandished''' was a favorite tavern of adventurers in [[Silverymoon]].
document_data.Geography: The building was located in [[Northbank]], on [[Sunset Lane]] in the westernmost angle of the [[Wallrun]] in the ''Gem of the North''.
document_data.Structure: The alehouse consisted of two floors with curtained alcoves and booths of rustic charm.
document_data.Atmosphere: The establishment was exceptionally luxurious and everyone was welcome there, no matter how strange or dangerous they were.
document_data.Staff: The service was attentive and accommodating, the barmaids were often seen taking care of disputes, and even guided drunks home. The staff was aided by [[wizard]]s earning 1 sp per ''[[Mage hand]]'' spell to deliver drinks quickly from customer to customer.
